Item.method_code: ' If the Issue does not have an item_number, populate from the default Sequence ' ' HISTORY ' peter schroer 02.0.2007 initial release ' ' ===================================================================== Dim MyInnovator = Me.NewInnovator() If Me.getProperty("item_number","")="" Then Me.setProperty("item_number", MyInnovator.getNextSequence("QS_Default_Issue_Number")) End If
Item.name: QS Issue OnBefore Add-Update
